Hi there, nibble101!

First off, I'm sorry that you're experiencing this issue. I'm going to need a little extra information to try to understand what might be going on better. :]

Do you happen to know which of these wards you're seeing problems with? The Banner of the Horse, Lantern of the Serpent, Banner of the Serpent, Gong, or Firecracker ward?

Are you able to select the ward skin in the Ward Skins tab in the Store? 

Do you not see the ward skin at all in Champion Select--like you're not able to find it or click on it at all? 

Did you make any recent ward skin purchases? The icon for the ward may have also just shifted in the Ward Skin Selection window that pops up when you press the button in Champ Select.

Thanks. :]

Hi there! Thanks for the info. :]

We looked into your account and found that you have never purchased a ward skin nor received one as a gift before, so it looks like you might have used the Lantern of the Serpent ward while it was free during either the 2013 or 2014 Lunar Revel events when the wards were free to select during the duration of the event. 

If you were able to successfully equip the ward and use it in game outside these events and now you aren't able to, then I think you should [hit up the awesome player support peeps](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your issue. They will be better able to help you out!
